name: Attack before they grow!
description:
Submission for the Kenney Jam 2022,

You control characters across the map to attack enemies and gain power-ups,  ⚔️

Hope you enjoy the nice style and the multiple levels,

Feel free to give me any feedback if needed.

Sorry if there are no HTML5 Builds, I had problems with itch and figured things out at the end of the jam ...

Enjoy 😄

Oh also, you can follow me on twitter where I post art 💛Yumeji ✨ (@YumejiArt) / Twitter
